imdb.plot outline: Spawning the period from 1967 to 2010, the series is about Lulwah who, as a young girl, has a relationship with a rich reckless man. After becoming pregnant, her family forces her to have an abortion. For the remainder of her life, Lulwah becomes a servant to her brothers, and a caretaker to their children. The brothers do every bad thing to abuse, terrorize, and take advantage of her, including trying to sell her organs while alive!.
imdb.title: Lailat Id
